event.title: Kick-off: Share how you're using (or thinking of using) ElasticSearch
event.description:
For our first meetup, just to set the scene, let's informally introduce ourselves and our interest in ElasticSearch.

I'm happy to kick off by explaining a little about how we're using ElasticSearch at The Filter to help power our realtime content personalisation platform. No PowerPoint, I promise and probably not more than 10 minutes.

If others would like to do the same that'd be great.

Later there will be an opportunity to network and dig a little deeper on a one-to-one basis over a drink.
